short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mint environmentally friendly NFT's for free. Subscribe and encrypt your NFT's as well, securing your assets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pairdot is an easy way to mint NFT's directly from your browser, without having to navigate to the page. You can be on opensea, rarity, foundation, super rare, mintable, or any other NFT marketplaces, and directly mint your asset and provide it as unlockable content when you create your NFT contract.
